product_name: Big Agnes Mad House 4 Footprint - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Use the ripstop polyester Big Agnes Mad House 4 Footprint underneath your Mad House 4 tent to protect it from wear and abrasion. Sized to fit so that it prevents pooling of water under tent during wet weather. Webbing stake-outs at tent corners provide easy attachment. Closeout.
short_description: Use the ripstop polyester Big Agnes Mad House 4 Footprint underneath your Mad House 4 tent to protect it from wear and abrasion.
